name: 2023: Alien Bugs Invade Earth
description:
** Based on the Kindle novel: "2023: Alien Bugs Invade Earth" **

A threat is brewing on the outer reaches of the Solar system, and when it makes landfall in 2023, chaos will erupt worldwide. Panic will grip nearly everyone...except for you!

In this story-driven 2D casual platform shooter, run, jump, and shoot across levels as you try to take down the alien Insectoids. Since their exoskeleton armor is 3 inches thick, things might not go well for you on the first or second try...

Keep at it, and the end of each level contains text-based debriefings where you might discover what secrets humanity has been up to since the 1947 Roswell crash, and those secrets will help you gain upgrades in weapons and armor to turn the tide against the Insectoid invaders in the more challenging levels.

In the current early access version, the player can expect:
-To run/jump/shoot alien insectoid invaders on three 2D levels
-To read through visual-novel-styled beginnings and endings for each level outlining more information about what is going on during the invasion.
-Most sounds, music, and visual backgrounds already implemented
-Alien insectoid implemented with basic AI & sounds
-Placeholder sprite art for player/hero character

PLANNED ADDITIONS:
-Intermediate story ending (alien UFO and debriefing about government secrets)
-Later in the game, you will take the fight to the skies and into space on a 2D rail shooter in your top-secret space fighter. Your target is the hive queen mastermind behind the invasion!
